mapper.insert: insert into oc_group_oper (group_oper_id, group_oper_name, group_oper_type, oper_num, group_id, group_type, snapshot_id, establish_time, group_task_status, end_time, group_task_desc, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{groupOperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupOperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupOperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snapshotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{establishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{groupTaskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{groupTaskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update oc_group_oper set group_oper_name = #{groupOperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_oper_type = #{groupOperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_num = #{operNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_type = #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, snapshot_id = #{snapshotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, establish_time = #{establishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, group_task_status = #{groupTaskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, group_task_desc = #{groupTaskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where group_oper_id = #{groupOperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select group_oper_id, group_oper_name, group_oper_type, oper_num, group_id, group_type, snapshot_id, establish_time, group_task_status, end_time, group_task_desc, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_group_oper where group_oper_id = #{groupOperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select group_oper_id, group_oper_name, group_oper_type, oper_num, group_id, group_type, snapshot_id, establish_time, group_task_status, end_time, group_task_desc, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_group_oper

select group_oper_id, group_oper_name, group_oper_type, oper_num, group_id, group_type, snapshot_id, establish_time, group_task_status, end_time, group_task_desc, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_group_oper where 1=1
and group_id=#{groupId}
and ( group_oper_name like '%${queryCondition}%' or group_task_desc like '%${queryCondition}%' )
order by establish_time desc

select t1.group_oper_id, t1.cust_no, t2.group_oper_name, t2.group_oper_type, t2.oper_num, t2.group_id, t2.group_type, t2.snapshot_id, t2.establish_time, t2.group_task_status, t2.end_time, t2.group_task_desc from oc_group_oper_cust t1,oc_group_oper t2 where 1=1 and t1.group_oper_id = t2.group_oper_id
and t1.group_oper_id=#{groupOperId}
